backup.title: Backup
backup.lead: Download application data. You can load any backup file at anytime and restore your application on any computer.

restore.title: Restore
restore.lead: Restore application data using a backup file.
restore.warning: Warning! All current data will be lost and uploaded data will be loaded instead.
restore.uploadError: Couldn't load backup file. Please verify file integrity.

reset.title: Delete Application Data
reset.lead: Select some or all the data you want to delete. Please backup your data before doing this incase you need to get your data back.
reset.resetSuccess: Application data for {{modules}} is successfully deleted. Please wait for reload
reset.resetError: An error occurred while deleting requested data

delete.title: Delete System
delete.lead: Delete all data, including currency settings, language, theme etc. Please make sure you have a backup of your data before taking this action. This will wipe all your application data.
delete.success: System data successfully cleared. Please wait for reload
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting application data. Please manually clear browser local storage.

isDemo.title: Demo Mode
isDemo.lead: You are using a demo backup file. After you are satisfied with the demo, you may leave demo mode to start using the application normally.
isDemo.leaveDemo: Leave Demo and remove all data
isDemo.leaveDemoWithoutWipe: Leave Demo but keep my progress
isDemo.leaveSuccess: You are no longer in demo mode.
isDemo.leaveError: An error occurred while leaving demo mode.
